sources.title: It's An Ill Wind (1939)
sources.description: During a storm, Porky and Dippy take refuge in a scary building and have many hilarious and hair-raising mishaps with imaginary spooks.

metadata.Plot: Porky and his friend Dizzy Duck go fishing, but their trip is cut short by a thunderstorm. They take refuge in an old building that appears haunted, though the biggest hazards are an old bearskin that lands on a swivel chair, a dog that gets tangled up in chains and a diving helmet, and their own clumsiness generally.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Ben Hardaway, Danny Webb
